Procurement Officer II Job at Edo State College of Education




        
    

        
        Edo State College of Education is founded on the desire to achieve educational reforms in the State, utilizing the facilities of the pre-existing campuses in Abudu, Afuze, and Igueben. It is a reflection of the intentions, expectations, goals, standards, and requirements for quality education delivery. In line with Governor Godwin Obaseki’s desire and commitment to improve the quality of Education in Edo State, this multi-campus State College of Education System with Specialization in various fields was established.

Applications are invited from suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement Officer II

Job Location: Igueben, Edo

Requirements
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Candidates must possess a Bachelor's Degree (minimum of second class lower division) in Business Administration / Finance or any relevant discipline plus NYSC discharge or exemption certificate.


Salary Grade
CONTEDISS 08.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should submit fifteen (15) typed written copies of their application letter, Curriculum Vitae (CV) and attached photocopies of all relevant documents.

The CV should be arranged in the following order:


	Full names (sumame first underlined)
	Date and place of birth
	State of Origin / Local Government Area
	Nationality
	Marital status
	Number and ages of children
	Current postal address including telephone numbers and email address.
	Educational Institutions attended with dates
	Academic/professional qualifications obtained with dates
	Membership of professional bodies / associations
	Previous employment(s) with post held with dates
	Vision statement (for Principal positions)
	Present employment indicating present status and salary.


All applications should be addressed and submitted in a sealed envelope to:
The Ag. Registrar,
Edo State College of Education, Igueben,
P.M.B003, Igueben,
Edo State.

In addition, an e-copy should be sent to: recruitment@edocoe.edu.ng using the Job Title as the subject of the email.

Note


	Applicants should request their referees (in academics, workplace and personal) to forward confidential reports on them directly to the address above.
	Only shortlisted candidates will be invited for interview.

  "description": "APTECH Computer Education&nbsp;stands as a global leader in career-oriented IT education, having trained over 7 million students in more than 40 countries. Established in 1986, APTECH has maintained its dedication to bridging the gap between theoretical knowledge and practical skills. With a robust network of over 1,300 training centers worldwide, the organization utilizes cutting-edge teaching methods and experienced instructors to equip individuals with the skills needed for success in the ever-evolving tech industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Network Specialist

Job Location:&nbsp;Lakowe, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Design, implement, and maintain secure and efficient network infrastructure.
	Monitor network performance and troubleshoot issues promptly.
	Configure routers, switches, firewalls, and other networking equipment.
	Ensure network security and data integrity through best practices.
	Provide technical support to end-users and IT staff.
	Prepare and maintain documentation of network configurations and updates.
	Collaborate with vendors for network solutions and upgrades.


Required Skills &amp; Competencies


	Strong knowledge of TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, and VPN configuration.
	Experience with Cisco, Mikrotik, or Fortinet devices.
	Hands-on experience in LAN/WAN setup and troubleshooting.
	Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
	Ability to work independently and in a team.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;evans@raptorstechnologies.com&nbsp;using &quot;Network Specialist&quot; as&nbsp;the subject of the email.
